parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear ABS brakes can cause extended stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents and collisions.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the rear wheels lock up
and the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rotor Failure due to Rust and Corrosion
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rotor can cause the vehicle to shake violently when applying the brakes, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rotor rusts and corrodes
becoming brittle and prone to cracking
causing the vehicle to shake violently when applying the brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the brake system can cause the brake pedal to go to the floor, leading to extended stopping distances and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
and the brakes may reengage by themselves after a few seconds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause the brake pedal to go to the floor, leading to extended stopping distances and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
and the master cylinder may need to be replaced multiple times.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to increased risk of accidents and collisions.
symptoms: The ABS system fails
causing the vehicle to lose traction and stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle U-bolts can cause the rear end of the vehicle to collapse, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: The rear end of the vehicle collapses to the ground
the vehicle is difficult to control
the vehicle is unable to maintain speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower ball joint can cause the wheel to separate from the vehicle, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: The wheel separates from the vehicle without warning
the front end of the vehicle collapses
unusual noises or vibrations while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt retractor can cause the seat belts to become inoperable, increasing the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belts will not release from the retractor mechanism
the seat belts are stuck
the seat belts are unable to be used.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of individual seat belt replacement parts and the high cost of replacing the entire set can lead to customers installing used belts with the same safety issues, potentially putting them at risk.
symptoms: Difficulty finding replacement seat belts
high cost of replacement
inability to purchase individual seat belt components.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Valve Cover Gasket Failure and Engine Fire Hazard
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the valve cover gaskets can cause oil leaks, which can lead to engine fires, posing a significant risk to vehicle occupants and other road users.
symptoms: Oil leaks from the valve cover area
engine fire
smoke or flames coming from the engine compartment.
